metadata.name: Tolerance
metadata.description:
What comes of evil? Tolerance, some understanding, isn't the key to peace?
Doesn't promoting religious tolerance, mutual understanding and peaceful coexistence on a global scale lead to international peace?
It doesn't matter which country or continent we live in. We live in the same world and under the same sky.

Artist: Serkan Ülker
Edition: 1/1
Camera: Nikon D610
Dimensions: 6000×4000
Resolution: 300 Dpi
Date: 04.09.2016
